item.description: Matt Lauer and Annette Roque divorced in 2019 after more than two decades of marriage

item.title: Catherine O’Hara Said the Role She Wanted to Be Remembered for Most Was Being a Mom to Her 2 Kids

item.title: Rachel McAdams Recalls Being Told She Was ‘Too Old’ to Play the Lead in “Mean Girls”: ‘I Took It as a Compliment’ (Exclusive)
item.description: She was "just right" for another game-changing role. The actress opens up to PEOPLE about how 'Mean Girls' and 'The Notebook' changed her life
